attributes.action: Introduce entitlement to £50 per week each through the present emergency.
attributes.background: A simple provision to ensure those now most in need do not go without. Introduce immediate entitlement irrespective of age and employment to reduce hardship. Those who don't need it don't need to claim it.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
